import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; import { connect, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { toggleDrawerMenu } from "~/store/app/action"; import { addProduct } from "~/store/product/action"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { fetchCategory } from "~/store/category/action"; import { useRouter } from "next/router"; import { actionGetSingleMechant } from "~/store/merchant/action"; import { actionGetSingleCustomer } from "~/store/customer/action"; import getStoredState from "redux-persist/es/integration/getStoredStateMigrateV4"; import { gettingStore } from "../gettingStore"; const ViewUser = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const router = useRouter(); const type = router.query.type; const id = router.query.user; let content, dispatchType; const getState = (state, det)=>{ return state.det } // const { customerDetails, singleCustomerGetLoading } = useSelector( // (state) => state.customer // ); const stuff = useSelector(getState()) if (type === "merchant") { setIsLoading(singleMerchantGetLoading) setDetails(merchantDetails) } else if (type === "customer") { setIsLoading(singleCustomerGetLoading) dispatch(actionGetSingleCustomer (id)); dispatchType = Customer } useEffect(() => { if (type === "merchant") { dispatch(actionGetSingleMechant(id)); } else if (type === "customer") { dispatch(actionGetSingleCustomer (id)); } dispatch(toggleDrawerMenu(false)); dispatch(fetchCategory()); }, [type, id]); if (!isLoading) { details = customerDetails.account; content = (
); } return (
{content}
Back {/* */}
); }; export default connect((state) => state.app)(ViewUser);
